mapper.sql: CONTRACTNO, POANO, CPAAMT, STARTDATE, GRACEPERIOD, PAYBACKACT, RECVACT, CPATYPE, PAYBACKBANKID, PAYBACKBANKNO, RECVBANKID, RECVBANKNO, CREATORID, CREATEDATE, CREATEFORM, UPDATORID, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEFORM, PAYBACKACTNAME, PRINCIPALAMT, SERVICECHARGEFEE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from XFCONTRACTPAYS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into XFCONTRACTPAYS (CONTRACTNO, POANO, CPAAMT, STARTDATE, GRACEPERIOD, PAYBACKACT, RECVACT, CPATYPE, PAYBACKBANKID, PAYBACKBANKNO, RECVBANKID, RECVBANKNO, CREATORID, CREATEDATE, CREATEFORM, UPDATORID, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEFORM, PAYBACKACTNAME, PRINCIPALAMT, SERVICECHARGEFEE ) values (#{contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poano,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpaamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{graceperiod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paybackact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpatype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paybackbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paybackbankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvbankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paybackactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{servicechargefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

update XFCONTRACTPAYS
CONTRACTNO = #{record.contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POANO = #{record.poano,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update XFCONTRACTPAYS
CPAAMT = #{cpaamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STARTDATE = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GRACEPERIOD = #{graceperiod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYBACKACT = #{paybackact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECVACT = #{recvact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CONTRACTNO = #{contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and POANO = #{poano,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
